channel.title: Networking on Nathan Curry - Sysadmin, RHCSA, CCENT

item.title: VLANs with Cisco and Ubiquiti
item.description: My girlfriend is out of town, so now’s a great time to set up VLANs. The Map I’m switching to 10.3.3.0/24, since that’s easier to type than 192.168.7.0/24, especially in the dark. Private LAN VLAN 1 10.3.3.0/25 Pool 80-126 Guest WiFi VLAN 99 10.3.3.128/26 No routing to other subnets IoT VLAN 5 10.3.3.208/28 Restricted routes available to other VLANs DMZ VLAN 10 10.
